thread.title: Watch: Lorde plays lover and assassin in Disclosure's Magnets music video
thread.title_full: Watch: Lorde plays lover and assassin in Disclosure's Magnets music video

title: Watch: Lorde plays lover and assassin in Disclosure's Magnets music video
text:
Watch: Lorde plays lover and assassin in Disclosure's Magnets music video Watch: Lorde plays lover and assassin in Disclosure's Magnets music video 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Disclosure just released the music video to Magnets ft. Lorde, and the witchy singer herself stars as a seductive hit-woman who takes revenge on her lover. 
On her tumblr she wrote: “I’m super proud of this one. in my head it’s dark electric blues and greens, and it moves like liquid. hope you like it.” 
The 18-year-old – real name Ella Marija Lani Yelich-O’Connor – is shown getting steamy with an older man. 
But the man has a wife, who looks on as Lorde chucks her cheating husband in a swimming pool and sets the surface on fire. 
Fans were a little confused by the narrative, to say the least. I've watched the Lorde/Disclosure Magnets music video like 5 times today b/c it's really good and really disturbing and I wanna get it. 
— Johanna Grace (@imjohannagrace) September 30, 2015 Wtf I'm confused and disappointed in Magnets
